thread.title: Adele on Beyoncé Losing Album of the Year - Adele Expands on Speech in Grammys Press Room 2017
thread.title_full: Adele on Beyoncé Losing Album of the Year - Adele Expands on Speech in Grammys Press Room 2017

author: Alyssa Bailey
title: Adele on Beyoncé Losing Album of the Year - Adele Expands on Speech in Grammys Press Room 2017
text:
Adele won the coveted Album of the Year Grammy last night in a victory many, including Adele herself, believed Beyoncé would take for Lemonade. Adele dedicated half her acceptance speech to Bey , refusing to accept the award on stage. "My life is Beyoncé, and the album to me, the Lemonade album, Beyoncé, was so monumental, and so well thought out," she told Bey and the crowd. "And so beautiful and soul bearing and we all got to see another side of you that you don't always let us see, and we appreciate that. All us artists adore you. You are our light."
#GRAMMYs : Adele turns her Album of the Year speech into a tear-filled Beyonce tribute https://t.co/Y0jS3o4c6W pic.twitter.com/T5XDRk9X4K
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 13, 2017
